description: This CSS file contains theme management variables and styles for the frontend of the Tic Tac Toe interactive game application, handling light and dark themes and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application style for layout and theming.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, centered layout with background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation for spinning effect.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the application, with color transition on hover.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
